DataElement.preferredName: Ocular Surface Disease Index Assessment Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value as a result of an ocular evaluation with the Ocular Surface Disease Index (OSDI), a 12 item questionnaire designed to provide a rapid assessment of the symptoms of ocular irritation consistent with dry eye disease and their impact on vision-related functioning, higher scores representing greater disability.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Ocular Surface Disease Index Assessment Outcome
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A 12 item questionnaire designed to provide a rapid assessment of the symptoms of ocular irritation consistent with dry eye disease and their impact on vision-related functioning. The OSDI is assessed on a scale of 0 to 100, with higher scores representing greater disability._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._The result of an action.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A 12 item questionnaire designed to provide a rapid assessment of the symptoms of ocular irritation consistent with dry eye disease and their impact on vision-related functioning. The OSDI is assessed on a scale of 0 to 100, with higher scores representing greater disability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
